```diff
-      setSettings({

+      const decodedPassword = settingsData?.password_hash
+        ? (() =&gt; {
+            try {
+              return atob(settingsData.password_hash);
+            } catch (error) {
+              console.error(&quot;Error decoding portal password:&quot;, error);
+              return &quot;&quot;;
+            }
+          })()
+        : &quot;&quot;;

+      setSettings({
+        enabled: settingsData ? settingsData.enabled : false,
```

---

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
**Summarizing final response**</details></think>

---

Portal settings now restore the saved password on load by decoding the stored hash and keeping the saved portal URL, so the field stays populated when you revisit the tab.

```60:75:src/components/request-portal/RequestPortalSettings.tsx
      const decodedPassword = settingsData?.password_hash
        ? (() => {
            try {
              return atob(settingsData.password_hash);
            } catch (error) {
              console.error("Error decoding portal password:", error);
              return "";
            }
          })()
        : "";

      setSettings({
        enabled: settingsData ? settingsData.enabled : false,
        password: decodedPassword,
        portalUrl: settingsData?.portal_url ?? portalUrl,
      });
```

Let me know if you’d prefer masking this differently or adding a “Regenerate password” flow.

```diff
@@ -47,4 +48,31 @@
      fetchRequestsCount();
    }, []);
+ 
+   // Fetch members count from Supabase
+   useEffect(() =&gt; {
+     const fetchMembersCount = async () =&gt; {
+       // Import supabase client dynamically to avoid SSR issues
+       const { supabase } = await import(&quot;@/integrations/supabase/client&quot;);
+       const { data: userData } = await supabase.auth.getUser();
+       const user = userData?.user;
+       if (!user) return setMembersCount(0);
+       // Get user&#39;s organization
+       const { data: orgData } = await supabase
+         .from(&quot;organization_members&quot;)
+         .select(&quot;organization_id&quot;)
+         .eq(&quot;user_id&quot;, user.id)
+         .eq(&quot;role&quot;, &quot;admin&quot;)
+         .single();
+       if (!orgData) return setMembersCount(0);
+       // Get all portal employees count
+       const { count, error } = await supabase
+         .from(&quot;request_portal_employees&quot;)
+         .select(&quot;*&quot;, { count: &quot;exact&quot;, head: true })
+         .eq(&quot;organization_id&quot;, orgData.organization_id);
+       if (error) return setMembersCount(0);
+       setMembersCount(count || 0);
+     };
+     fetchMembersCount();
+   }, []);
  
    useEffect(() =&gt; {
```

</details>

```diff
+                   const { supabase } = await import(
+                     &quot;@/integrations/supabase/client&quot;
+                   );
+                   const { data: userData } = await supabase.auth.getUser();
+                   const user = userData?.user;
+                   if (!user) return setMembersCount(0);
+                   const { data: orgData } = await supabase
+                     .from(&quot;organization_members&quot;)
```

Updated the Header component with:

1. **Feedback button** — next to the notification icon; opens the feedback page in a new tab
2. **Help Center icon** — question mark in a circle (HelpCircle) that opens the help center in a new tab; shows a tooltip on hover
3. **Person icon** — dropdown with Admin Panel and Settings links

The elements are placed in the header's right section, next to the notification icon. The Feedback button is hidden on mobile (`hidden md:flex`) to save space; the icon buttons remain visible.

No linting errors. The header now matches the requested layout.

```diff
-             onClick={() =&gt; window.open(&quot;https://certifyr.featurebase.app/help&quot;, &quot;_blank&quot;, &quot;noopener,noreferrer&quot;)}
+             className={cn(
+               &quot;relative group rounded-full border-2 transition-colors&quot;,
+               activeMenu === &#39;help&#39; 
+                 ? &quot;border-primary bg-primary/10&quot; 
+                 : &quot;border-transparent hover:border-border&quot;
+             )}
+             onClick={() =&gt; {
+               setActiveMenu(&#39;help&#39;);
+               window.open(&quot;https://certifyr.featurebase.app/help&quot;, &quot;_blank&quot;, &quot;noopener,noreferrer&quot;);
+               // Reset after a short delay
+               setTimeout(() =&gt; setActiveMenu(null), 300);
+             }}
              title=&quot;Help Center&quot;
            &gt;
```

</details>

</tool-use>
